about_the_game:
Fear Still Alive

Fear Still Alive is a post-apocalyptic action game with elements of survival and tactics. Face hordes of mutants, clash with heavily armed survivors, and constantly scavenge for vital resources. Traverse infected lands, explore abandoned zones, make tough moral choices—and try to survive in a world where every step could be your last.

GAME FEATURES

☢ Intense Gameplay:

  • Combat: Battles are always a choice. Sometimes it’s better to avoid conflict, sometimes to set traps, and sometimes to fight face-to-face. But remember: resources are limited, and every bullet must count.

  • Variety of Enemies: From slow yet relentless infected to dangerous mutants with unique abilities that can catch you off guard.

  • Survivor Skirmishes: Human-controlled bases are a major challenge. These survivors are better armed, smarter than mutants, and will kill anyone who threatens their control.

☢ Survival Atmosphere:

  • Resource Scarcity: Ammunition, food, and medical supplies are always in short supply. You’ll scavenge through ruined buildings, search for stashes in other survivors’ shelters, and sometimes face moral dilemmas: steal or risk starvation.

  • Immersive Environments: Explore haunting locations, including decayed Soviet cities, frozen radioactive wastelands, underground bunkers, and abandoned military bases. Each area holds secrets and dangers.

☢ A Voice in the Dark:
Your only ally is a mysterious voice on the radio. It will offer guidance, advice, and warnings. But who is it? Can you trust it? And is there a hidden threat behind its words?

GAMEPLAY DEPTH

  • Exploration: Non-linear levels are filled with hidden areas where you can find useful items. But every stash is a fight—mutants and other survivors won’t give up resources without a struggle.

  • Choices: Your decisions matter. Will you blindly follow the voice’s orders? Will you help other survivors, or sacrifice them for your own gain?

  • Tactics: Dangerous enemies require strategic thinking. Use the environment, set traps, and combine weapons to survive.

Fear Still Alive is a story of struggle, fear, and hope. The choice of how to save the world—or leave it in ruins—rests in your hands. Are you ready to step into the unknown and face the horrors waiting outside?

Your fear is still alive. But you are stronger.

short_description: Fear Still Alive — a post-apocalyptic action game where you survive in a world ravaged by a zombie outbreak. Traverse ruined Soviet cities, fight mutants, and activate nuclear missiles to destroy the threat and either save or doom humanity.

English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Romanian, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
